password-pattern: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
new-password-must-be-different: New password must be different from the current password
fitness-assistant-greeting: Hello! I'm your fitness assistant. How can I help you today?
error-message: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
connection-error: I apologize, but my connection to the AI service is not configured properly. Please contact support.
offline-error: You appear to be offline. Please check your internet connection.
quota-error: The AI service quota has been exceeded. Please try again later.
invalid-key-error: The API key may be invalid or doesn't have permission to access this service.
unknown-error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.
chat-welcome-message: Ask me anything about fitness, nutrition, or workout routines!
chat-privacy-notice: Your conversations are stored locally on your device.
delete-confirmation-description: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This action cannot be undone.
we-tailor: We tailor every workout to fit your unique goals and fitness level ensuring that you make the most progress.
everything-do: Everything we do is designed to help you achieve measurable results, whether you’re aiming for weight loss.
we-provide-the-latest-: We provide the latest in gym equipment, from cardio machines to free weights, designed to support every type.
we-offer-a-fitness-journey: We offer a fitness journey that’s tailored to your goals, supported by professional trainers and a welcoming community. Whether it’s weight loss, strength building, or overall wellness, our proven methods.

hero-description: It's your mind that needs convincing. Push past your limits, stay committed, and watch as your body transforms into a powerhouse of strength and resilience. Start your journey today & truly capable of!

we-believe-fitness-is-more-than-just-a-w: We believe fitness is more than just a workout—it's a lifestyle. With top-of-the-line facilities, certified trainers, and a supportive community, we're here to inspire and guide you every step of the way.
achieve-your-fitness-goals-with-the-guid: Achieve your fitness goals with the guidance of our certified trainers.
from-steady-state-runs-to-interval-sprin: From steady-state runs to interval sprints, our treadmill programs.
our-gym-is-equipped-with-the-latest-card: Our gym is equipped with the latest cardio & strength machines.
fuel-your-fitness-journey-with-customize: Fuel your fitness journey with customized meal plans for you.
empoweringMessage: EMPOWERING YOU TO ACHIEVE YOUR FITNESS GOALS
tagline: Push harder, go further. Your fitness journey starts today!
